entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -27.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 08:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

Temperature: -27.9°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 63 %

Dewpoint: -32.8°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
